virtual bool WK_Synonym::hasMoreLong ( void   )  [pure virtual]

This function returns whether or not there are synonym entries that contain more than one entry and are longer than an entry.

Date:
2008-11-04
Author:
HeeGeun Park
Returns:
a boolean.
true - there are synonym entries that contain more than one entry and are longer than an entry.
false - there are not synonym entries that contain more than one entry and are longer than an entry.
